short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every purchase you make on Amazon.com will give a percentage back to Maple Street School.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is for the parents and alumni of Maple Street School.

Once installed, this app runs in the background while you shop on Amazon.com and gives Maple Street School a percentage of all of the purchases you make on Amazon's site.

Maple Street School is a parent cooperative preschool in the Prospect Lefferts Gardens neighborhood in Brooklyn, NY.

http://maplestreetschool.org
